name: Product card
description:
This was designed to help the discussion went on this post:

https://www.linkedin.com/posts/sagargiri07_ui-ux-design-activity-6834708952593371136-P6-I/



Buy it, use it, break it, fix it

Trash it, change it, mail – upgrade it

Charge it, point it, zoom it, press it

Snap it, work it, quick – erase it
